sourcesContent:
<script>
import { Bar } from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
    name: 'BarChart',
    extends: Bar,
    props: {
        data: {
            type: Object,
            default: null
        },
        options: {
            type: Object,
            default: null
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        this.renderChart(this.data, this.options)
    }
}
</script>
